title: Fractionation of beech wood cell walls into digestible cellulose-rich residues and photoluminescent lignin-rich precipitates via semi-flow hot-compressed water treatment with 2-naphthol
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,20660-20667

Hydrothermal treatment with 2-naphthol is an effective approach for the complete utilization of cell wall components from wood biomass.
